place.name: LONG LANE
place.gazetteerText: LONG LANE, a chapelry in Trusley parish, Derbyshire; 5 miles N of Tutbury r. station, and 7 W of Derby. Post town, Derby. Statistics of property and pop. have not been returned. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Lichfield. Value, not reported.* Patron, the Vicar of Sutton-on-the-Hill. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
